Params: {1: '1', 3: 'In front of them, stands a Corrupted in tattered clothing, which could still be recognized as a clerical uniform.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'On his neck hangs a bloodied, and very familiar cross.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Snow', 3: "...Th-that's not the same Bianca. I... I've eaten already.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Commotion', 3: "...Those goddamned mechanic monsters! You're still talking about religion in this day and age?"}
{2: 'Commotion', 3: "Look around you!... And what do we have? Who's gonna save us?..."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Snow', 3: "...Everyone is born a sinner, including... me... No... I'm fine.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Snow', 3: "Bianca, don't... No need to come over.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Snow', 3: 'I... need to stay, I need to stay, I need to... protect this church...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Soldier', 3: "He doesn't seem to... Want to attack the nun?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'On the battered mechanic hand of the Corrupted hangs a human arm, which had hooked onto the metal of his clothing when it was torn off.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'In the hand of the arm, is a Gurkha knife.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'God, if you can hear me now.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Snow', 3: '...Bianca... You have always been a gentle, yet strong and brave child...', 4: '1'}
